title: Perfect Uninstaller 5.3 Portable
description:
Perfect Uninstaller v5.3 Portable

No Need to install it.

Or, if you want to, Setup and Serial are included...

More infos at:

www.perfectuninstaller.com

This package contains a first Portable version built using RunHiddenConsole.exe to start the Batch file that changes some values in Registry, runs the program and deletes the Registry values when exiting from the program. This is done just to avoid having the sloppy DOS window in the background. Some AVs complain with it recognizing RunHiddenConsole.exe as a malicious/potentially harmful program as it can be used to hide malicious behaviours. If it&#039;s your case, or just don&#039;t trust in the first one, just use the second version.


Enjoy and remember to seed... :o)
